hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{2} \text{ white ducks}\\
+&  \underline{\blue9 \text{ brown ducks}}\\
=&\pink{11} \text{ ducks in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Angela saw some ducks sitting by the pond. She saw $2$ white ducks and $9$ brown ducks.

**How many ducks did Angela see in all? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] ducks
